Were is the crack? I canÂ´t find it! Please write i full explanation were it is.

The crack is on the "CD"
open up your cd so you see all files on it. 
in there is a map called crack open it.
copy the exe file from in there to the game directory. for example
C:\...\2K Games\Firaxis Games\Sid Meier's Railroads!
when it says do you want to replace the original file with this one you say Yes.
easy.

Does Anyone Know If This Torrent Works?

Works fine. D/l it. you may need Ultraiso for extraction, but right click the cd then click extract here. run the setup.exe. then when that is finished copy the crack exe file from in there to the game directory. for example
C:\...\2K Games\Firaxis Games\Sid Meier's Railroads!       (mine was in c:downloads)
when it says do you want to replace the original file with this one you say Yes. 
It is now ready to play. works perfect for me

Once you are done playing the game's standard maps you can find many custom, fan made map ones here: http://www.smrsimple.com/category/maps/

There are some really good ones like Basin & Range and many include new trains and buildings.
